"na ithin ara dora ekapara wahenne hulagata wenda.ooka thiyanna hari yayi" "oba thuma mawa wihiluwakata gaththada?mata me thiyena dahasak prashna walata duka walata uththara hoyaganna man aawe" "dukanam ithin hamotama urumane mahaththayo.man eekatath piliyamak karannan" "kiyannako balanna" mahaththaya me dunna rupiyal siyath aran yanna.yanin gaman pan raththalakuyi .ee po kola thunak hatharak witharayi ganna" "ha ha hari hari" "gedara awith ara eka koleka oya mahaththayata thiyena siyaluma prashna liyanna" "hari hari eeta passe eeka rol karanawa.man dannawa me widiyo eke thibbe ooka...me menna meka "innako mahaththaya...eeta passe anith kole aran ara prashna eka ekak enna hethu wena wenama liyanna" "eeta passe eekath rol karanawa" "na..ganna anith koleth aran eeke liyanna ara prashnawalata hethu walakwala prashnayath walakwanna mahaththayata karanna puluwan dewal" "eeta passe kola thunama rol karala pan gediye hilakuth hadala" "na na ehema newe..eelangata thiyenne nopasubata uthsahayen ara thunwana kole liyapu eewa kriyathmaka karawana eka" "ethakota ara pan gediya mokatada?"

sowiyat adhirajyaye wadagath wahal rajyayak wune polanthayayi.sowiyat adhirajya wasin oorthodoks kristhiyanin wuwada polanthawasihu romanu katholikayoya.sowiyat komiyunist waru aagam adahima hakithak adhairya kalaha.ek awasthawaka paksha niladharaya gowin hamuwimata pamina gowin ha katha bas karannata wiya.aa amathaka wuna kiyannata.waga karanne kumakda yanna thiranaya karanne pakshayayi.eya pamanak nowa heta kanne monawada yannath heta adina adumath thiranaya karanne pakshayayi.meya yam athishayokthiyak wuwada sathyasannaya.
